name: Acute Intensive Services
description: As part of the continuum of care offered at Edgewood, there are four programs designed for youth under the umbrella of Intensive Mental Healthcare Services. Residential Treatment Program Hospital Diversion Program Partial Hospitalization Program Intensive Outpatient Program Through these services, Edgewood can assess and treat youth (ages 12 to 17) who require immediate and intensive support. Youth can be referred to them by any counselor, therapist, behavioral health professional, medical provi

howToGetIt: Program Director Alyssa Kianidehkian, LMFT, alyssaki@edgewood.org Admissions Providers can access services or make referrals anytime by calling 415.682.3160 or online through our Connect with Us form (see website). Questions or Referrals Online- see service website
agency: Edgewood Center for Children and Families
